Author: cloudbric
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: Yes a few of the security services we currently offer are the following.  -Malware Protection -Web Application Firewall -DDoS Protection -CDN Speed Optimization -SSL Encryption -XSS Attacks -SQL Injection Attacks -Brute Force Attacks -Vulnerability Scanners -PORT Scanners  They are offered for web server protections, but we will have it extended to devices after the ICO, as well as offer protection for cryptocurrency assets!

Author: cloudbric
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: We definitely agree with you on that. Cyber attacks are becoming more complex and creative every day. Cloudbric aims to offer easy to use and accessible security for not only exchanges, but individuals who previously had no access (due to reasons such as difficulty of using security products, and/or a lack of financial resources) to security services.  Our 1st pre sale started yesterday and was sold out in 15 minutes! We are onto a good start

Author: cloudbric
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: We have more detailed use cases on our blog. Feel free to check it out    https://www.cloudbric.com/blog/2018/08/cloudbric-use-case-api-utilization-developing-security-product-more/  https://www.cloudbric.com/blog/2018/07/cloudbric-use-case-examples-phishing-prevention-anti-spam-protection/  Let us know if you have any questions~

Author: himanshu93
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: please explain how you guys protect against DDoS Attacks. That is the most important.

Author: cloudbric
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: Cloudbric started off as a web application firewall service, and DDoS protection was one of the services offered. Cloudbric's security service has also been awarded multiple awards (SC Magazine, Stevie Awards, etc.) and featured in media such as Gartner, and Frost & Sullivan.  Our server side security/website security is open and available for use at this moment. Traffic under 4GB is free, so if you have a website you'd like to try out Cloudbric's service on, please go ahead! https://www.cloudbric.com/

Author: cloudbric
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: You're absolutely correct - protection is always needed by everyone. But this has been difficult before for reasons such as high pricing, difficulty of using the product, etc. What cloudbric aims to achieve is to provide security for the every day user in the blockchain industry, as well as in daily life, non blockchain related, by making information security open and accessible to all users. The Universal Security Platform is an all-inclusive suite of ready-made cybersecurity solutions that utilizes AI and deep learning, and with our patent pending AI deep learning machine, cloudbric will be able to provide one of the highest false positive accuracy rates in the market.

Author: cloudbric
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: Below is our ICO Sale Schedule! Our 1st round of pre sales was sold out in 15 minutes, and you can read about it here https://www.cloudbric.com/blog/2018/08/cloudbric-clb-token-first-pre-sale-sold-out-15-minutes/    Second Round Pre Sale: Dates: 09/13 ~ 9/22 (11am UTC) Bonus: 10% Cap: 3,000 ETH Cap Minimum transaction amount: NONE Maximum transaction amount: NONE  Crowd Sale: Dates: 10/04 ~ 10/13 (11am UTC) Bonus: 0% Cap:  5,000 ETH Minimum transaction amount: NONE Maximum transaction amount: NONE  https://www.cloudbric.com/blog/2018/08/clb-token-pre-sale-crowd-sale-schedule/   Yes, we are a working company with customers, partners, revenue, and of course with a working product. We are a reverse ICO!  You can reach us in real time via our telegram channel at https://t.me/cloudbric

Author: cloudbric
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: "Secure Your Blockchain Experience" with Cloudbric Reverse ICO's Decentralized Universal Security Platform  Bounty Program | Website | Whitepaper | OnePager | Twitter | Telegram | Facebook | Blog   Revolutionizing the Cybersecuity Landscape Cloudbric is a decentralized universal security platform that is comprised of three security components that will change the way you look at cybersecurity forever through the power of the blockchain.   Security That Fits Everyone's Needs The first component of Cloudbric will be a free suite of elite security solutions in an easy to use and consolidated platform. This will feature Cloudbric's award winning website security and will soon offer mobile device security, as well as cryptocurrency asset protection.   Accessible Cyber Threat Information to the Masses Next, cyber threat information detected by the Cloudbric universal security platform will be made open and accessible to the masses through interactive tools and data found on Cloudbric Labs. Cloudbric Labs is an award winning free decentralized security resource community created for the users by the users.   Introducing the "Secure to Earn" Rewards System The third and last component of Cloudbric will feature a CLB token rewards system for users that help contribute to the growth and advancement of Cloudbric's new universal security ecosystem.   About Cloudbric A reverse ICO, Cloudbric is a Decentralized Universal Security Platform which will aim to use blockchain technology in order to enhance and expands its existing globally acclaimed web security service. Composed of a team with a proven track record of over 20 years of cybersecurity experience, Cloudbric will provide Crypto Asset Security in addition to a suite of elite security solutions in a single platform that will be easily accessible through PC or mobile. Cloudbric started as an in-house venture of Penta Security Systems, South Korea's no. 1 web and data security vendor. Founded in 2015, Cloudbric provides elite Web Application Firewall (WAF), DDoS Protection, CDN, and SSL encryption services for free (https://www.cloudbric.com). Cloudbric currently has 8,000+ members, 50 global partners, and more than 25 service regions to date. Receiving numerous awards and recognition, Cloudbric will use its proven track record to bring a Decentralized Universal Security Platform through its Reverse ICO.  Our Partners Goldford Venture Capital ZeroCap Finwex Labs EOSYS GMO Plesk Hetzner Microsoft Azure And More!  Our Accolades SC Magazine Awards 2016 Europe Winner Info Security Products Guide 2018 Global Excellence Silver Cyber Security Excellence Awards Winner 2018 2018 Asia Pacific Stevie Awards Silver Winner No.1 WAF Vendor in the APAC region Gartner - Recognized on the Gartner WAF Magic Quadrant CDM - Hot Company in Web Application Security for 2016  Roadmap  Late 2018 Deep Learning technology integration (VISION) End of ICO & Token Fistribution Listing on cryptocurrency exchanges Development of Universal Security Platform  Early 2019 Initial service launch of Universal Security Platform Start of Security Rewards program through threat data contribution and resource community Decentralize security information on blockchain Begin on-boarding enterprise clients to use CLB tokens  Late 2019 Expansion of Cloudbric's Universal Security Platform Expansion of CLB Security Rewards Program  Early 2020 Full version launch of the Universal Security Platform Full expansion of Security Rewards Program Full decentralization of threat data on the blockchain  Late 2020 Begin conceptualization of IoT Security Platform                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Curious to know more about Cloudbric’s ICO? Sign up for the latest news on bounty, airdrops, and events! And join us on our Telegram Channel to chat with us live!   For more on Cloudbric, visit us at: Bounty Program ICO Home Page Reddit Blog LinkedIn Twitter Korean KakaoTalk

Author: fcmatt
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: will there be a presale before the ICO? and if yes, is there any soft cap and hardcap for it?  I see you have many partners there, and can you prove it that you partner with them?

Author: cloudbric
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: Hi fcmatt.  Yes, there will be a pre sale - it's scheduled to be around July. Out of 1,000,000,000 CLB (1 billion CLB) maximum supply, the hard cap is 540,000,000 CLB (540 million CLB). In Ethereum that would roughly be about 37,200 ETH. There is no soft cap.  As for partners we have quite a few press releases that can be found online. Here are a few examples.  Microsoft (this one is in Korean but you can see the company names in English) https://www.facebook.com/MicrosoftBusinessLounge/photos/pcb.672500669613500/672500589613508/?type=3&theater  Hetzner https://hetzner.co.za/cloudbric/  eSecureData https://globenewswire.com/news-release/2017/09/22/1131607/0/en/Cloudbric-and-eSecureData-Announce-Partnership-to-Extend-WAF-Service-to-Web-Hosting-Providers.html  Join our Telegram channel if you'd like to hear more, at https://t.me/cloudbric

Body: It looks like a good korean project. Security is now a matter of great importance. You have good partners.

Author: cloudbric
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: Yes, with cryptocurrencies and the blockchain technology starting to take deeper root in today's world, security should be up to par with it. Not just for big organizations too, it's more important that individuals with limited access to a wide range of security solutions are protected. That's what Cloudbric is trying to bring - free, accessible, and user friendly security that anyone can use and also be rewarded for.  Thanks for your interest

Author: cloudbric
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: Yes, a reverse ICO is launched by existing companies that already have a working product and existing customers. Kik and Telegram are two successful examples of a reverse ICO. Hopefully Cloudbric can become one too!

Body: We've updated our roadmap. We are expected to be listed on exchanges by late 2018.  Thanks for your interest! Let us know if you have any more questions

Author: ProLumuc23
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: The first component of Cloudbric will be a free suite of elite security solutions in an easy to use and consolidated platform. This will feature Cloudbric's award winning website security and will soon offer mobile device security, as well as cryptocurrency asset protection.

Author: icohunter1024
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: Cloudbric will assist in protecting users against phishing through the Secure Web Gateway by providing instant protection against not only phishing sites but also malicious files and URLs, fraud crypto addresses, and other spam sites. As such, phishing protection will be leveraged by decentralized data collected by Cloudbric Labs as users report these phishing sites to build onto the database.

Author: Otap2018
Title: [ANN] Cloudbric Reverse ICO (CLB) "Secure Your Blockchain Experience"
Body: What Cloudbric aims to achieve is to decentralize all of this information in the hopes that this will further spark innovation and widespread adoption of cybersecurity best practices from the community.
